Text: This was one of the very first comics I read as a kid. I think the WildCATS was kinda based on this book.
thanks, I can't wait to read this!
oh, so this is just the Marvel Graphic Novel... will you upload the three-issue Lodestone Comics run?
Cool! Can't wait to read this! Dave Cockrum is so underated as a creator. He was one of the alltime greats.
So, this is where the 4400 mainly got their entire show concept from?
